title: Java Full Stack Developer
description: Led the design and implementation of Microservices architecture, transitioning from a monolithic system to improve scalability and deployment efficiency using Spring Boot.
Developed and optimized serverless workflows using AWS Lambda, setting up real-time monitoring with AWS CloudWatch for better performance tracking.
Built responsive and interactive user interfaces with React and Angular, enhancing user experience and integrating seamless data communication via APIs.
Automated deployment and CI/CD processes with Jenkins and Docker, ensuring efficient and reliable software delivery.
Implemented comprehensive data processing and logging mechanisms using Apache Kafka and Log4j, enabling effective monitoring and analytics.

title: Java Full Stack Developer
description: Worked in an Agile environment, contributing to sprint planning and daily stand-ups, ensuring effective team collaboration and project delivery.
Designed and developed a validation service on the Spring MVC framework, integrating it with a SQL database and building a responsive UI feature.
Implemented and managed Kubernetes for container orchestration, ensuring high availability and scalability of distributed applications.
Defined resources and automated infrastructure using Azure Resource Manager (ARM) templates, optimizing resource provisioning.
Developed and deployed Spring Boot Microservices, creating and consuming REST APIs to support modular and scalable system architecture.

title: Specialist Programmer
description: Developed and optimized RESTful APIs using Spring Boot and Java, improving response times with Redis caching and query optimization.
Led the design and deployment of a multi-language compilation engine with Docker, AWS ECS, and Redis Streams for large-scale coding competitions.
Migrated backend services from monolithic architecture to microservices, enhancing scalability and performance in a distributed cloud environment.
Automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Kubernetes, and AWS CodeDeploy, streamlining software delivery and infrastructure management.
Implemented security and monitoring solutions with OAuth2, Spring Security, and AWS CloudWatch, ensuring API protection and system observability.

title: Java Full Stack Developer
description: Designed and developed scalable Microservices and web applications using Java and Spring Framework, enhancing data management and integration efficiency.
Utilized Hibernate ORM to map data from MVC models to Oracle relational schema, optimizing database interactions and performance.
Implemented asynchronous messaging with JMS and real-time communication using Socket.IO, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for dynamic front-end functionality.
Developed and managed Cassandra clusters and automated server provisioning on EC2 using Chef, ensuring robust infrastructure.
Actively participated in SCRUM practices, contributing to pair programming, maintaining data accuracy with JSON parsers, and performing performance testing with JMeter.
